WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.TransformationXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <!-- This transformation updates the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement 6.0 "Requirement" definition to v6.2 --> <!-- See http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudioalm/archive/2013/04/04/upgrade-your-2012-process-template-from-rtm-to-update-2.aspx for details --> <Witd:WITD xmlns:Witd="http://schemas.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/2008/workitemtracking/typedef" xmlns:xdt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/XML-Document-Transform"> <WORKITEMTYPE> <WORKFLOW> <TRANSITIONS> <!-- Set the value of the ResolvedBy and ResolvedDate fields in the transition "Active to Closed" --> <TRANSITION from="Active" to="Closed" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)"> <FIELDS> <!-- First remove the fields if they exist to make this script idempotent --> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Active' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Active' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> </FIELDS> </TRANSITION> <!-- Set the value of the ActivatedBy, ActivatedDate, ResolvedBy and ResolvedDate fields in the transition "Proposed to Closed" --> <TRANSITION from="Proposed" to="Closed" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)"> <FIELDS> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedDate" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedDate" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Proposed' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedBy" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedBy" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Proposed' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Proposed' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy" xdt:Transform="InsertBefore(//WORKITEMTYPE/WORKFLOW/TRANSITIONS/TRANSITION[@from='Proposed' and @to='Closed']/FIELDS/FIELD[@refname='Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate'])"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> </FIELDS> </TRANSITION> </TRANSITIONS> </WORKFLOW> </WORKITEMTYPE> </Witd:WITD>

WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.Description: TFS2012.0 or TFS2012.1 to TFS2012.2 - Agile Configuration
WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.TransformationXml: <?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- This transformation updates the Agile Configuration from TFS 2012.0 or TFS 2012.1 to TFS 2012.2 --> <!-- See http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudioalm/archive/2013/04/04/upgrade-your-2012-process-template-from-rtm-to-update-2.aspx for details --> <AgileProjectConfiguration xmlns:xdt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/XML-Document-Transform"> <ProductBacklog> <Columns> <!-- First remove the Tags column if it exists to make this script idempotent --> <Column refname="System.Tags" xdt:Transform="Remove" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" /> <!-- Insert the Tags column at the end --> <Column width="200" refname="System.Tags" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </Columns> </ProductBacklog> </AgileProjectConfiguration>
